hero.title: Understand Your Cycle,
hero.subtitle: Track your period, predict fertile windows, gain insights into your unique patterns, and sync with your body's natural rhythm effortlessly.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: From simple logging to powerful insights, we've got you covered.

tracking.title: Effortless Tracking
tracking.description: Quickly log your period start and end dates. Simple and intuitive.

predictions.title: Smart Predictions
predictions.description: See your predicted fertile window, ovulation day, and next period.

insights.title: Personalized Insights
insights.description: Discover your average cycle length, period duration, and unique patterns.

benefits.title: Connect With Your Body
benefits.subtitle: Go beyond tracking. Understand the 'why' behind your cycle.

plan.title: Plan Ahead with Confidence
plan.description: Know when to expect your period and fertile days, making it easier to plan events, trips, or intimacy.

wellbeing.title: Tune Into Your Wellbeing
wellbeing.description: Notice patterns in your energy, mood, and physical symptoms throughout your cycle to better support your overall health.

peek.title: Simple, Visual, Insightful
peek.subtitle: Get a clear view of your cycle at a glance with our intuitive dashboard.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Your Rhythm?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of women taking control of their cycle health. It's free!

newUser.title: Welcome! Let's Get Started
newUser.subtitle: Log your first period to unlock personalized cycle insights, predictions, and more.

errors.endDateBeforeStart: End date cannot be before the start date.

statusText.ovulation: Based on your data, today looks like your predicted {emphasis}.
statusText.fertile: You're likely in your {emphasis} right now.
statusText.low: Currently predicted to be {emphasis} your fertile window.
